name: Foxy
text: When Attacking Don!! -3: If you have 3 or more (Foxy Pirates) characters in play, choose up to one each of your opponents rested leaders and characters. The cards you chose do not become active during their owner's next refresh phase.

effect.text: If you have 3 or more (Foxy Pirates) characters in play, choose up to one each of your opponents rested leaders and characters. The cards you chose do not become active during their owner's next refresh phase.
